QAPair.Question: What is (are) How to avoid overheating during exercise ?
QAPair.Answer: Whether you are exercising in warm weather or in a steamy gym, you are more at risk for overheating. Learn how heat affects your body, and get tips for staying cool when it is warm out. Being prepared can help you safely work out in most conditions.
